alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 4:55PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Elko County through 545 PM PDT... At 454 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles northwest of Elko to 6 miles northeast of Lamoille to 18 miles southeast of Lee. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, and blowing dust. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Blowing dust could reduce visibilities and make it difficult to travel. Locations impacted include... Wells, Ruby Valley, Clover Valley, Deeth, Ryndon, Angel Lake, Moor Summit, Secret Pass, Star Valley, and Halleck. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County
